resources.string: PC-status need a connection via WiFi or bluetooth\n\nWhat you want to use?
To scan QRcode PC status need permission granted for camera
PC-status is a client for Android that, by connecting to PC-status on your computer, shows statistics about the use of PC resources.
To use PCstatus you need a connection to the same WiFi network as your PC or a Bluetooth connection to your computer\n\nTurn on the Wifi and try again or use bluetooth?
Scan Qrcode in PC-status on your PC (settings tab)
Searching for bluetooth connection with server. Please wait…

WiFi connection
 1.	 On your PC, open PC-status and click on settings icon, now you can see a QR code
 2.	 Open PC-status - Android client and choose WiFi connection
 3.	 Scan QR code on you PC
 4.	 Done! ;)
 
 Bluetooth connection
 1.	 Pair with Bluetooth your Android phone with your Windows computer using Windows bluetooth settings
 2.	 Open PC-status for desktop on your PC
 3.	 Open PC-status - Android client and choose Bluetooth connection
 4.	 Done! ;)
Then, if you want to support a little developer, you can buy premium version and remove all ads
First of all, you need to download and start PC-status for desktop
Download and execute PC-status for Desktop
If you do not download yet PC-status fro desktop, download it on my GitHub Pages. Got to\n\nhttps://github.com/andrea9293/pcstatus/releases

1.	On your PC, open PC-status and click on settings icon, now you can see a QR code
 2.	On PC-status - Android client choose WiFi connection
 3.	Scan QR code on you PC
 4.	Done! ;)

1.	Pair with Bluetooth your Android phone with your Windows computer using Windows bluetooth settings
 2.	Open PC-status for desktop on your PC
 3.	On PC-status - Android client choose Bluetooth connection
 4.	Done! ;)
PC-status need a permission to use camera for scan QR code in WiFi connection type
